resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/Copy raw NYC taxi fare and trip data')]

activities.name: Copy nyc taxi data to data lake
IngestTripDataIntoADLS
activities.description: Copies the trip data csv file from the git repo and loads it into the ADLS.

activities.name: IngestTripFaresDataIntoADLS
activities.description: Copies the trip fare data csv file from the git repo and loads it into the ADLS.

activities.name: JoinAndAggregateData
activities.description: Reads the raw data from both CSV files inside the ADLS, performs the desired transformations (inner join and aggregation) and writes the transformed data into the synapse SQL pool.

dependsOn.activity: Create Schema If Does Not Exists

activities.name: Create Schema If Does Not Exists
activities.description: Creates the schema inside the SQL dedicated pool. Shema name comes from the pipeline parameter 'SchemaName'.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = '@{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}')
BEGIN
EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA @{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		VendorID as integer,
		tpep_pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		tpep_dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		passenger_count as integer,
		trip_distance as decimal(7,2),
		RatecodeID as integer,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		PULocationID as integer,
		DOLocationID as integer,
		ZoneKey as integer,
		payment_type as integer,
		fare_amount as decimal(7,2),
		extra as decimal(5,2),
		mta_tax as decimal(5,2),
		tip_amount as decimal(5,2),
		tolls_amount as decimal(5,2),
		improvement_surcharge as decimal(5,2),
		total_amount as decimal(7,2),
		YYYYMM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StageTaxiTrip
source(output(
		LocationID as integer,
		Borough as string,
		Zone as string,
		ServiceZone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StageTaxiZone
StageTaxiTrip derive(YYYYMM = toString(tpep_pickup_datetime,"YYYY-MM"),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		YYYYMM
	)) ~> DerivedColumnsTrip
StageTaxiZone keyGenerate(output(ZoneKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
SurrogateKey derive(EffectiveDt = currentDate(),
		ExpirationDt = toDate(null()),
		ActiveFlag = 1) ~> DerivedColumnsZone
DerivedColumnsZone, AggregateLocationStats join(LocationID == DOLocationID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLocationStats
DerivedColumnsTrip aggregate(groupBy(DOLocationID),
	TripCount = count(),
		AverageDistance = avg(trip_distance),
		AverageFare = avg(fare_amount)) ~> AggregateLocationStats
DerivedColumnsTrip, SelectZoneLookup join(DOLocationID == LocationID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinZoneLookup
DerivedColumnsZone select(mapColumn(
		LocationID,
		ZoneKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectZoneLookup
JoinZoneLookup select(mapColumn(
		VendorID,
		tpep_pickup_datetime,
		tpep_dropoff_datetime,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		RatecodeID,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		PULocationID,
		DOLocationID,
		payment_type,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		YYYYMM,
		ZoneKey = SelectZoneLookup@ZoneKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTripCols
SelectTripCols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'delta',
	folderPath: 'synapse_dataflow/nyc-tlc/taxi_trip',
	overwrite:true,
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		VendorID,
		tpep_pickup_datetime,
		tpep_dropoff_datetime,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		RatecodeID,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		PULocationID,
		DOLocationID,
		ZoneKey,
		payment_type,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		YYYYMM
	)) ~> TaxiTrip
JoinLocationStats sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'delta',
	folderPath: 'synapse_dataflow/nyc-tlc/taxi_zone',
	overwrite:true,
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TaxiZone

source(output(
		VendorID as integer,
		tpep_pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		tpep_dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		passenger_count as integer,
		trip_distance as decimal(7,2),
		RatecodeID as integer,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		PULocationID as integer,
		DOLocationID as integer,
		ZoneKey as integer,
		payment_type as integer,
		fare_amount as decimal(9,2),
		extra as decimal(7,2),
		mta_tax as decimal(7,2),
		tip_amount as decimal(7,2),
		tolls_amount as decimal(7,2),
		improvement_surcharge as decimal(7,2),
		total_amount as decimal(9,2),
		YYYYMM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StageTaxiTrip
source(output(
		LocationID as integer,
		Borough as string,
		Zone as string,
		ServiceZone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StageTaxiZone
source(output(
		LocationID as integer,
		Borough as string,
		Zone as string,
		ServiceZone as string,
		ZoneKey as long,
		EffectiveDt as date,
		ExpirationDt as date,
		ActiveFlag as integer,
		DOLocationID as integer,
		TripCount as long,
		AverageDistance as decimal(11,6),
		AverageFare as decimal(11,6)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'delta',
	folderPath: 'synapse_dataflow/nyc-tlc/taxi_zone') ~> TaxiZoneSource
StageTaxiTrip derive(YYYYMM = toString(tpep_pickup_datetime,"YYYY-MM"),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		YYYYMM
	)) ~> DerivedColumnsTrip
StageTaxiZone keyGenerate(output(ZoneKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
Join1 derive(EffectiveDt = currentDate(),
		ExpirationDt = toDate(null()),
		ActiveFlag = 1,
		ZoneKey = ZoneKey + MaxZoneKey) ~> DerivedColumnsZone
DerivedColumnsZone, AggregateLocationStats join(LocationID == DOLocationID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLocationStats
DerivedColumnsTrip aggregate(groupBy(DOLocationID),
	TripCount = count(),
		AverageDistance = avg(trip_distance),
		AverageFare = avg(fare_amount)) ~> AggregateLocationStats
DerivedColumnsTrip, SelectZoneLookup join(DOLocationID == LocationID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinZoneLookup
DerivedColumnsZone select(mapColumn(
		LocationID,
		ZoneKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectZoneLookup
JoinZoneLookup select(mapColumn(
		VendorID,
		tpep_pickup_datetime,
		tpep_dropoff_datetime,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		RatecodeID,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		PULocationID,
		DOLocationID,
		payment_type,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		YYYYMM,
		ZoneKey = SelectZoneLookup@ZoneKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTripCols
TaxiZoneSource derive(ActiveFlag = 0,
		ExpirationDt = currentDate()) ~> UpdateTaxiZone
UpdateTaxiZone alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> UpdateExistingZones
TaxiZoneSource aggregate(MaxZoneKey = max(ZoneKey)) ~> MaxZoneKeyAgg
SurrogateKey, MaxZoneKeyAgg join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
JoinLocationStats select(mapColumn(
		LocationID,
		Borough,
		Zone,
		ServiceZone,
		ZoneKey,
		EffectiveDt,
		ExpirationDt,
		ActiveFlag,
		DOLocationID,
		TripCount,
		AverageDistance,
		AverageFare
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectZoneCols
SelectZoneCols, UpdateExistingZones union(byName: true)~> Union1
SelectTripCols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'delta',
	folderPath: 'synapse_dataflow/nyc-tlc/taxi_trip',
	overwrite:true,
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		VendorID,
		tpep_pickup_datetime,
		tpep_dropoff_datetime,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		RatecodeID,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		PULocationID,
		DOLocationID,
		ZoneKey,
		payment_type,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		YYYYMM
	)) ~> TaxiTrip
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'delta',
	folderPath: 'synapse_dataflow/nyc-tlc/taxi_zone',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ZoneKey'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TaxiZone

source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TripDataCSV
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		payment_type as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		surcharge as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		total_amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FaresDataCSV
InnerJoinWithTripFares aggregate(groupBy(payment_type),
	average_fare = avg(toInteger(total_amount)),
		total_trip_distance = sum(toInteger(trip_distance))) ~> AggregateByPaymentType
TripDataCSV, FaresDataCSV join(TripDataCSV@medallion == FaresDataCSV@medallion
	&& TripDataCSV@hack_license == FaresDataCSV@hack_license
	&& TripDataCSV@vendor_id == FaresDataCSV@vendor_id
	&& TripDataCSV@pickup_datetime == FaresDataCSV@pickup_datetime,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoinWithTripFares
AggregateByPaymentType sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SynapseAnalyticsSink

resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/01 - Inspect raw taxi trip csv files')]

content.query:
/* inspect raw taxi trip data */
SELECT TOP 50
    VendorID
    ,tpep_pickup_datetime
    ,tpep_dropoff_datetime
    ,passenger_count
    ,trip_distance
    ,RatecodeID
    ,store_and_fwd_flag
    ,PULocationID
    ,DOLocationID
    ,payment_type
    ,fare_amount
    ,extra
    ,mta_tax
    ,tip_amount
    ,tolls_amount
    ,improvement_surcharge
    ,total_amount
FROM
OPENROWSET(
BULK'https://spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/yellow_tripdata_2017-01.csv',
FORMAT='CSV',
PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = true
    )AS[result]

/*
DROP SCHEMA stage;

CREATE SCHEMA stage;
*/

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS stage.taxi_trip_2017;
GO

CREATE VIEW stage.taxi_trip_2017
AS 
SELECT
CAST(VendorID AS int) AS VendorID
,CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS SMALLDATETIME) AS tpep_pickup_datetime
,CAST(tpep_dropoff_datetime AS SMALLDATETIME) AS tpep_dropoff_datetime
,CAST(passenger_count AS int) AS passenger_count 
,CAST(trip_distance AS decimal(7,2)) AS trip_distance 
,CAST(RatecodeID AS int) AS RatecodeID
,CAST(store_and_fwd_flag AS char(1)) AS store_and_fwd_flag
,CAST(PULocationID AS int) AS PULocationID
,CAST(DOLocationID AS int) AS DOLocationID
,CAST(NULL AS int) AS ZoneKey
,CAST(payment_type AS int) AS payment_type
,CAST(fare_amount AS decimal(9,2)) AS fare_amount
,CAST(extra AS decimal(7,2)) AS extra
,CAST(mta_tax AS decimal(7,2)) AS mta_tax
,CAST(tip_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS tip_amount
,CAST(tolls_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS tolls_amount
,CAST(improvement_surcharge AS decimal(7,2)) AS improvement_surcharge
,CAST(total_amount AS decimal(9,2)) AS total_amount
,SUBSTRING(CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS varchar(16)),1,7) AS YYYYMM
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
BULK'https://spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/*_2017-*.csv',
FORMAT='CSV',
PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) raw_data;
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS stage.taxi_trip_2018;
GO

CREATE VIEW stage.taxi_trip_2018
AS 
SELECT
CAST(VendorID AS int) AS VendorID
,CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS SMALLDATETIME) AS tpep_pickup_datetime
,CAST(tpep_dropoff_datetime AS SMALLDATETIME) AS tpep_dropoff_datetime
,CAST(passenger_count AS int) AS passenger_count 
,CAST(trip_distance AS decimal(7,2)) AS trip_distance 
,CAST(RatecodeID AS int) AS RatecodeID
,CAST(store_and_fwd_flag AS char(1)) AS store_and_fwd_flag
,CAST(PULocationID AS int) AS PULocationID
,CAST(DOLocationID AS int) AS DOLocationID
,CAST(NULL AS int) AS ZoneKey
,CAST(payment_type AS int) AS payment_type
,CAST(fare_amount AS decimal(9,2)) AS fare_amount
,CAST(extra AS decimal(7,2)) AS extra
,CAST(mta_tax AS decimal(7,2)) AS mta_tax
,CAST(tip_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS tip_amount
,CAST(tolls_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS tolls_amount
,CAST(improvement_surcharge AS decimal(7,2)) AS improvement_surcharge
,CAST(total_amount AS decimal(9,2)) AS total_amount
,SUBSTRING(CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS varchar(16)),1,7) AS YYYYMM
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
BULK'https://spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/*_2018-*.csv',
FORMAT='CSV',
PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) raw_data;
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS stage.taxi_trip_2019;
GO

CREATE VIEW stage.taxi_trip_2019
AS 
SELECT
CAST(VendorID AS int) AS VendorID
,CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS SMALLDATETIME) AS tpep_pickup_datetime
,CAST(tpep_dropoff_datetime AS SMALLDATETIME) AS tpep_dropoff_datetime
,CAST(passenger_count AS int) AS passenger_count 
,CAST(trip_distance AS decimal(7,2)) AS trip_distance 
,CAST(RatecodeID AS int) AS RatecodeID
,CAST(store_and_fwd_flag AS char(1)) AS store_and_fwd_flag
,CAST(PULocationID AS int) AS PULocationID
,CAST(DOLocationID AS int) AS DOLocationID
,CAST(NULL AS int) AS ZoneKey
,CAST(payment_type AS int) AS payment_type
,CAST(fare_amount AS decimal(9,2)) AS fare_amount
,CAST(extra AS decimal(7,2)) AS extra
,CAST(mta_tax AS decimal(7,2)) AS mta_tax
,CAST(tip_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS tip_amount
,CAST(tolls_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS tolls_amount
,CAST(improvement_surcharge AS decimal(7,2)) AS improvement_surcharge
,CAST(total_amount AS decimal(9,2)) AS total_amount
,SUBSTRING(CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS varchar(16)),1,7) AS YYYYMM
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
BULK'https://spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/*_2019-*.csv',
FORMAT='CSV',
PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) raw_data;
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS stage.taxi_trip_2020;
GO

CREATE VIEW stage.taxi_trip_2020
AS 
SELECT
CAST(VendorID AS int) AS VendorID
,CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS SMALLDATETIME) AS tpep_pickup_datetime
,CAST(tpep_dropoff_datetime AS SMALLDATETIME) AS tpep_dropoff_datetime
,CAST(passenger_count AS int) AS passenger_count 
,CAST(trip_distance AS decimal(7,2)) AS trip_distance 
,CAST(RatecodeID AS int) AS RatecodeID
,CAST(store_and_fwd_flag AS char(1)) AS store_and_fwd_flag
,CAST(PULocationID AS int) AS PULocationID
,CAST(DOLocationID AS int) AS DOLocationID
,CAST(NULL AS int) AS ZoneKey
,CAST(payment_type AS int) AS payment_type
,CAST(fare_amount AS decimal(9,2)) AS fare_amount
,CAST(extra AS decimal(7,2)) AS extra
,CAST(mta_tax AS decimal(7,2)) AS mta_tax
,CAST(tip_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS tip_amount
,CAST(tolls_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS tolls_amount
,CAST(improvement_surcharge AS decimal(7,2)) AS improvement_surcharge
,CAST(total_amount AS decimal(9,2)) AS total_amount
,SUBSTRING(CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS varchar(16)),1,7) AS YYYYMM
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
BULK'https://spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/*_2020-*.csv',
FORMAT='CSV',
PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) raw_data;
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS stage.taxi_zone;
GO

CREATE VIEW stage.taxi_zone
AS 
SELECT
CAST(LocationID AS int) AS LocationID
,CAST(Borough AS varchar(64)) AS Borough
,CAST(Zone AS varchar(64)) AS Zone
,CAST(service_zone AS varchar(64)) AS ServiceZone
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
BULK'https://spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/nyc-tlc/lookup-data/taxi_zone_lookup.csv',
FORMAT='CSV',
PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) raw_data;
GO

resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/Data Exploration and ML Modeling - NYC taxi predict using Spark MLlib')]

source:
# Predict NYC Taxi Tips using Spark ML and Azure Open Datasets

The notebook ingests, visualizes, prepares and then trains a model based on an Open Dataset that tracks NYC Yellow Taxi trips and various attributes around them.
The goal is to predict for a given trip whether there will be a tip or not.

 https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/spark/apache-spark-machine-learning-mllib-notebook

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

from pyspark.sql.functions import unix_timestamp

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

from pyspark.ml import Pipeline
from pyspark.ml import PipelineModel
from pyspark.ml.feature import RFormula
from pyspark.ml.feature import OneHotEncoder, StringIndexer, VectorIndexer
from pyspark.ml.classification import LogisticRegression
from pyspark.mllib.evaluation import BinaryClassificationMetrics
from pyspark.ml.evaluation import BinaryClassificationEvaluator

## Ingest Data 

Get a sample data of nyc yellow taxi to make it faster/easier to evaluate different approaches to prep for the modelling phase later in the notebook.

# Import NYC yellow cab data from Azure Open Datasets
from azureml.opendatasets import NycTlcYellow

from datetime import datetime
from dateutil import parser

end_date = parser.parse('2018-05-08 00:00:00')
start_date = parser.parse('2018-05-01 00:00:00')

nyc_tlc = NycTlcYellow(start_date=start_date, end_date=end_date)
nyc_tlc_df = nyc_tlc.to_spark_dataframe()
#To make development easier, faster and less expensive downsample for now

## Exploratory Data Analysis

Look at the data and evaluate its suitability for use in a model, do this via some basic charts focussed on tip values and relationships.

#The charting package needs a Pandas dataframe or numpy array do the conversion
sampled_taxi_pd_df = sampled_taxi_df.toPandas()

# Look at tips by amount count histogram
ax1 = sampled_taxi_pd_df['tipAmount'].plot(kind='hist', bins=25, facecolor='lightblue')
ax1.set_title('Tip amount distribution')
ax1.set_xlabel('Tip Amount ($)')
ax1.set_ylabel('Counts')
plt.suptitle('')
plt.show()

# How many passengers tip'd by various amounts
ax2 = sampled_taxi_pd_df.boxplot(column=['tipAmount'], by=['passengerCount'])
ax2.set_title('Tip amount by Passenger count')
ax2.set_xlabel('Passenger count') 
ax2.set_ylabel('Tip Amount ($)')
plt.suptitle('')
plt.show()

# Look at the relationship between fare and tip amounts
ax = sampled_taxi_pd_df.plot(kind='scatter', x= 'fareAmount', y = 'tipAmount', c='blue', alpha = 0.10, s=2.5*(sampled_taxi_pd_df['passengerCount']))
ax.set_title('Tip amount by Fare amount')
ax.set_xlabel('Fare Amount ($)')
ax.set_ylabel('Tip Amount ($)')
plt.axis([-2, 80, -2, 20])
plt.suptitle('')
plt.show()

## Data Prep and Featurization

It's clear from the visualizations above that there are a bunch of outliers in the data. These will need to be filtered out in addition there are extra variables that are not going to be useful in the model we build at the end.

Finally there is a need to create some new (derived) variables that will work better with the model.

## Data Prep and Featurization Part 2

Having created new variables its now possible to drop the columns they were derived from so that the dataframe that goes into the model is the smallest in terms of number of variables, that is required.

Also create some more features based on new columns from the first round.

## Encoding

Different ML algorithms support different types of input, for this example Logistic Regression is being used for Binary Classification. This means that any Categorical (string) variables must be converted to numbers.

The process is not as simple as a "map" style function as the relationship between the numbers can introduce a bias in the resulting model, the approach is to index the variable and then encode using a std approach called One Hot Encoding.

This approach requires the encoder to "learn"/fit a model over the data in the Spark instance and then transform based on what was learnt.

## Generation of Testing and Training Data Sets
Simple split, 70% for training and 30% for testing the model. Playing with this ratio may result in different models.

# Decide on the split between training and testing data from the dataframe 
trainingFraction = 0.7
testingFraction = (1-trainingFraction)
seed = 1234

# Split the dataframe into test and training dataframes
train_data_df, test_data_df = encoded_final_df.randomSplit([trainingFraction, testingFraction], seed=seed)

## Train the Model

Train the Logistic Regression model and then evaluate it using Area under ROC as the metric.

## Create a new LR object for the model
logReg = LogisticRegression(maxIter=10, regParam=0.3, labelCol = 'tipped')

## The formula for the model
classFormula = RFormula(formula="tipped ~ pickupHour + weekdayVec + passengerCount + tripTimeSecs + tripDistance + fareAmount + paymentType+ trafficTimeBinsVec")

## Undertake training and create an LR model
lrModel = Pipeline(stages=[classFormula, logReg]).fit(train_data_df)

## Saving the model is optional but its another for of inter session cache
datestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%m-%d-%Y-%s');
fileName = "lrModel_" + datestamp;
logRegDirfilename = fileName;
lrModel.save(logRegDirfilename)

## Predict tip 1/0 (yes/no) on the test dataset, evaluation using AUROC
predictions = lrModel.transform(test_data_df)
predictionAndLabels = predictions.select("label","prediction").rdd
metrics = BinaryClassificationMetrics(predictionAndLabels)
print("Area under ROC = %s" % metrics.areaUnderROC)

## Evaluate and Visualize

Plot the actual curve to develop a better understanding of the model.

## Plot the ROC curve, no need for pandas as this uses the modelSummary object
modelSummary = lrModel.stages[-1].summary

plt.plot([0, 1], [0, 1], 'r--')
plt.plot(modelSummary.roc.select('FPR').collect(),
         modelSummary.roc.select('TPR').collect())
plt.xlabel('False Positive Rate')
plt.ylabel('True Positive Rate')
plt.show()

resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspaceName'), '/Dive into Delta Lake Workshop - Initial Load')]

source:
# Dive into Delta Lake Workshop #
### Spark 3.1.2 | Delta Lake 1.0.0 ###

Reference: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/spark/apache-spark-3-runtime

taxi_zone_raw = "abfss://raw@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-tlc/lookup-data/taxi_zone_lookup.csv"
taxi_trip_raw_2017 = "abfss://raw@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/*_2017-*.csv"
taxi_trip_raw_2018 = "abfss://raw@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/*_2018-*.csv"
taxi_trip_raw_2019 = "abfss://raw@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/*_2019-*.csv"
taxi_trip_raw_2020 = "abfss://raw@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-tlc/trip-data/yellow/*_2020-*.csv"

taxi_trip_parquet = "abfss://delta@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse_spark/nyc-tlc/taxi_trip"

taxi_zone_delta = "abfss://delta@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse_spark/nyc-tlc/taxi_zone"
taxi_trip_delta = "abfss://delta@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse_spark/nyc-tlc/taxi_trip"
spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS delta_lake_house")

%%sql
CREATE TABLE delta_lake_house.taxi_trip
USING delta
PARTITIONED BY (YYYYMM)
LOCATION "abfss://delta@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse_spark/nyc-tlc/taxi_trip"
AS SELECT
CAST(VendorID AS int) AS VendorID
,CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS timestamp) AS tpep_pickup_datetime
,CAST(tpep_dropoff_datetime AS timestamp) AS tpep_dropoff_datetime
,CAST(passenger_count AS int) AS passenger_count 
,CAST(trip_distance AS decimal(5,2)) AS trip_distance 
,CAST(RatecodeID AS int) AS RatecodeID
,CAST(store_and_fwd_flag AS char(1)) AS store_and_fwd_flag
,CAST(PULocationID AS int) AS PULocationID
,CAST(DOLocationID AS int) AS DOLocationID
,CAST(NULL AS int) AS ZoneKey
,CAST(payment_type AS int) AS payment_type
,CAST(fare_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS fare_amount
,CAST(extra AS decimal(5,2)) AS extra
,CAST(mta_tax AS decimal(5,2)) AS mta_tax
,CAST(tip_amount AS decimal(5,2)) AS tip_amount
,CAST(tolls_amount AS decimal(5,2)) AS tolls_amount
,CAST(improvement_surcharge AS decimal(5,2)) AS improvement_surcharge
,CAST(total_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS total_amount
,SUBSTR(tpep_pickup_datetime,1,7) AS YYYYMM
FROM delta_lake_house.stage_taxi_trip_2017

%%sql
CREATE TABLE delta_lake_house.taxi_zone
USING delta
LOCATION "abfss://delta@spoexxbkqfmujmvmpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse_spark/nyc-tlc/taxi_zone"
AS SELECT
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY CAST(tz.LocationID AS int)) as ZoneKey
,CAST(tz.LocationID AS int) AS LocationID
,CAST(tz.Borough AS varchar(64)) AS Borough
,CAST(tz.Zone AS varchar(64)) AS Zone
,CAST(tz.service_zone AS varchar(64)) AS ServiceZone
,tt.TripCount
,tt.AverageDistance
,tt.AverageFare
,CAST(current_date() AS DATE) AS EffectiveDt
,CAST(NULL AS DATE) AS ExpirationDt
,1 AS ActiveFlag
FROM 
delta_lake_house.stage_taxi_zone tz
LEFT OUTER JOIN
    (SELECT
    CAST(DOLocationID AS int) AS DOLocationID
    ,COUNT(*) AS TripCount
    ,AVG(trip_distance) AS AverageDistance
    ,AVG(fare_amount) AS AverageFare
    FROM
    delta_lake_house.taxi_trip
    GROUP BY
    CAST(DOLocationID AS int)
    ) tt
    ON tz.LocationID = tt.DOLocationID
ORDER BY 
CAST(tz.LocationID AS int)

%%sql
MERGE INTO delta_lake_house.taxi_trip 
USING delta_lake_house.taxi_zone 
ON delta_lake_house.taxi_trip.DOLocationID = delta_lake_house.taxi_zone.LocationID
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET delta_lake_house.taxi_trip.ZoneKey = delta_lake_house.taxi_zone.ZoneKey

# Dive into Delta Lake Workshop #
### Spark 3.1.2 | Delta Lake 1.0.0 ###

Reference: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/spark/apache-spark-3-runtime

%%sql
INSERT INTO delta_lake_house.taxi_trip
SELECT
CAST(VendorID AS int) AS VendorID
,CAST(tpep_pickup_datetime AS timestamp) AS tpep_pickup_datetime
,CAST(tpep_dropoff_datetime AS timestamp) AS tpep_dropoff_datetime
,CAST(passenger_count AS int) AS passenger_count 
,CAST(trip_distance AS decimal(5,2)) AS trip_distance 
,CAST(RatecodeID AS int) AS RatecodeID
,CAST(store_and_fwd_flag AS char(1)) AS store_and_fwd_flag
,CAST(PULocationID AS int) AS PULocationID
,CAST(DOLocationID AS int) AS DOLocationID
,CAST(NULL AS int) AS ZoneKey
,CAST(payment_type AS int) AS payment_type
,CAST(fare_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS fare_amount
,CAST(extra AS decimal(5,2)) AS extra
,CAST(mta_tax AS decimal(5,2)) AS mta_tax
,CAST(tip_amount AS decimal(5,2)) AS tip_amount
,CAST(tolls_amount AS decimal(5,2)) AS tolls_amount
,CAST(improvement_surcharge AS decimal(5,2)) AS improvement_surcharge
,CAST(total_amount AS decimal(7,2)) AS total_amount
,SUBSTR(tpep_pickup_datetime,1,7) AS YYYYMM
FROM delta_lake_house.stage_taxi_trip_2018
SELECT * FROM delta_lake_house.taxi_trip WHERE YYYYMM > '2018-00' LIMIT 5

%%sql
UPDATE delta_lake_house.taxi_zone 
SET 
ExpirationDt = CAST(current_date() AS DATE)
,ActiveFlag = 0
WHERE
ExpirationDt IS NULL

%%sql
INSERT INTO delta_lake_house.taxi_zone
SELECT
row_number() OVER(ORDER BY CAST(tz.LocationID AS int)) + (SELECT MAX(ZoneKey) FROM delta_lake_house.taxi_zone) as ZoneKey
,CAST(tz.LocationID AS int) AS LocationID
,CAST(tz.Borough AS varchar(64)) AS Borough
,CAST(tz.Zone AS varchar(64)) AS Zone
,CAST(tz.service_zone AS varchar(64)) AS ServiceZone
,tt.TripCount
,tt.AverageDistance
,tt.AverageFare
,CAST(current_date() AS DATE) AS EffectiveDt
,CAST(NULL AS DATE) AS ExpirationDt
,1 AS ActiveFlag
FROM 
delta_lake_house.stage_taxi_zone tz
LEFT OUTER JOIN
    (SELECT
    CAST(DOLocationID AS int) AS DOLocationID
    ,COUNT(*) AS TripCount
    ,AVG(trip_distance) AS AverageDistance
    ,AVG(fare_amount) AS AverageFare
    FROM
    delta_lake_house.taxi_trip
    WHERE
    YYYYMM > '2018-00'
    GROUP BY
    CAST(DOLocationID AS int)
    ) tt
    ON tz.LocationID = tt.DOLocationID
ORDER BY 
CAST(tz.LocationID AS int)
SELECT * FROM delta_lake_house.taxi_zone WHERE LocationID = 1 LIMIT 5

%%sql
MERGE INTO delta_lake_house.taxi_trip 
USING delta_lake_house.taxi_zone 
ON delta_lake_house.taxi_trip.DOLocationID = delta_lake_house.taxi_zone.LocationID 
AND delta_lake_house.taxi_zone.ActiveFlag = 1
AND delta_lake_house.taxi_trip.YYYYMM > '2018-00'
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET delta_lake_house.taxi_trip.ZoneKey = delta_lake_house.taxi_zone.ZoneKey

%%sql
SELECT 
ZoneKey
,DOLocationID
,YYYYMM
,COUNT(*) AS TripCount 
FROM 
delta_lake_house.taxi_trip 
WHERE 
DOLocationID = 1 AND YYYYMM IN ('2017-01', '2018-01') 
GROUP BY
ZoneKey
,DOLocationID
,YYYYMM
LIMIT 5
